summary: CPTSD is a mental health condition caused by long-term or repeated traumatic events. It's like regular post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), but with extra symptoms. These include trouble controlling emotions, negative thoughts about yourself, and problems in relationships. People with CPTSD might feel scared, worthless, and always on alert. It's similar to other disorders like borderline personality disorder, but it's specifically linked to complex trauma.
title: Complex post-traumatic stress disorder
